1662310.name: Junkman Simulator
1662310.description:
Junkman Simulator


Build Your Junkyard by Earned Money! Earn money by Cleaning Scraps, Explore New Areas,
Build and Repair Your Car and Start Exploring,
Adopt Pet, Build Machines and Geneartors,Convert Scraps to Metals and Sell Customers! Hang Out In City!
Find Special Hidden Objects and Build Your House, Delivery Metals Your Customers, Repair Customers Broken Cars.


Look At Features and Game!

Repair Cars

Buy Car Parts and Repair Customers Cars and Earn Money!

Clean Junkyard and Scraps!

Clean Scraps and Earn Money Them!
Buy Scrap Generator For More Scraps!

Upgrade/Build Your Junkyard

Buy New Machines and Repair Your Car and Start Adventure!
Junkyard is important! It's your workplace!

Decorate Your House

Decorate Your House, Buy New Furnitures...

Deliver Your Orders!

Convert Your Scraps to Metal and Deliver Metals to Customers..
Customers like to order metal.
You can track your sales from the computer!
